title: Your stars today
text:
See what the stars have in store for you today.

TUESDAY OCTOBER 15, 2019

ARIES March 21-April 20 ***

Stop running around in a fluster and instead, focus on sorting out a financial issue. Clear communication – and good listening skills - will get the money train back on track again.

TAURUS April 21-May 21 ****

The Moon links up with Uranus in Taurus. So being practical and perceptive will take you far today! If you have to make a tough decision, then listen to the wisdom of your inner voice.

GEMINI May 22-June 21 ***

The Moon’s in Taurus today and you have much to learn from your earthy zodiac neighbour. Like being less hasty and more hard-working; less procrastinating and much more productive.

CANCER June 22-July 23 ****

You have the ability to influence and teach others in far-reaching ways. The more you network with colleagues and friends, the more positive and productive you’ll all feel. Lead by example.

LEO July 24-Aug 23 ***

Tend to work matters or regular chores ASAP. Then you’ll have plenty of time to do what you really want to do at the end of the day. The more organised you are, the more you’ll accomplish.

VIRGO Aug 24-Sep 23 ****

With the Moon in fellow earth sign Taurus, your attention to detail is even better than usual. So any work you do will be of a high standard, as others sit up and notice your numerous talents.

LIBRA Sep 24-Oct 23 ***

The Taurus Moon helps others view you in a more down-to-earth way. Joint finances and research projects are also highlighted today, as you tackle things in a careful and creative fashion.

SCORPIO Oct 24-Nov 22 ***

Expect plenty of phone calls, emails, texts, tweets and snail mail today – especially from loved ones. Strive to handle a perceived communication problem in a practical and perceptive way.

SAGITTARIUS Nov 23-Dec 21 ***

The more you rush activities, the more overwhelming the day will be. The Taurus Moon encourages you to approach routine tasks much more methodically, one steady step at a time.

CAPRICORN Dec 22-Jan 20 ****

Creative projects, hobbies and sporting activities are favoured as the Taurus Moon increases your motivation to get things done. So make the most of the steady energy boost while you can.

AQUARIUS Jan 21-Feb 19 ***

Don’t waste time being disorganised. The more practical and disciplined you are, the better the outcome will be. It’s also a good day to nurture loved ones and network with colleagues.

PISCES Feb 20-March 20 ***

The earthy Taurus Moon helps to ground your flighty feelings. If you have to speak in front of a group of people, then make sure you have something substantial - and well-prepared - to say.

YOUR DAY

Combine practical skills with a steady-as-she-goes approach.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

You’re committed to getting ahead but you’ll make more progress if you’re not so provocative. The coming year is the time to take some well-earned breaks.

Copyright Joanne Madeline Moore 2019
description: See what the stars have in store for you today.
